subject: Football
Names, Organizational
Discrimination
Native Americans
lead_paragraph: Fifty senators signed a letter urging more pressure on the Redskins’ ownership to change the team’s name, pointing to the N.B.A.’s action against the Clippers’ owner, Donald Sterling, for racist comments.
snippet: Fifty senators signed a letter urging more pressure on the Redskins’ ownership to change the team’s name, pointing to the N.B.A.’s action against the Clippers’ owner, Donald Sterling, for racist comments.
